name: Rogue Racing: PinkSlip
description:
Street Racing. Custom Cars. Rogue Attitude

Get ready for a 100% personalized mobile racing experience! Create the ultimate, custom racing rig with over 50 different aftermarket parts and style options.Competie in pulse-pounding, winner-take-all events on gritty, inner-city streets.

RACE FOR "PINK SLIPS"
Race your friends, and if you win, own their cars. Smash them, sell them, keep them. They lose and you win. This is how it it is done in style.

AWESOME 3D GRAPHICS
Rogue Racing pushes the limits of mobile hardware with incredibly detailed car models, high frame rates, and dense racing environments. Graphics are optimized for the latest iPhone and iPad devices.

INTENSE, DYNAMIC GAMEPLAY
Compete against cutthroat AI racers that dynamically match your skills in exciting game modes including: Street, Time-Attack, and Elimination.

UNLIMITED CUSTOMIZATION
Totally customize any of the 24 unique tuners, Euros, muscle cars, and hot rods with rims, spoilers, exhausts, intakes, decals, paintjobs, and even neon ground effects.

TIGHT, PRECISE CONTROLS
Choose a driving method that fits your style; including casual tap controls, gyroscopic accelerometer, or our new analog-style, radial thumb controls.
